scholarships.name: Global Leaders Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: International students with a minimum GPA of 3.5
scholarships.notes: Requires an essay on leadership experience.

scholarships.name: STEM Innovators Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: Students enrolled in STEM programs with at least a 3.0 GPA

scholarships.name: Women in Technology Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: Female students pursuing degrees in Computer Science or IT
scholarships.notes: Must submit a project portfolio and a letter of recommendation.

scholarships.name: Environmental Conservation Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: Students focusing on environmental studies or related fields
scholarships.notes: Includes an internship opportunity at Green Earth.

scholarships.name: Nepalese Students Merit Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: Nepalese citizens with outstanding academic performance (GPA 3.8+)
scholarships.notes: Requires proof of citizenship and academic transcripts.

scholarships.name: Nepalese Students Merit Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: Nepalese citizens with outstanding academic performance (GPA 3.8+)
scholarships.notes: Requires proof of citizenship and academic transcripts.
